title: post login with valid and invalid credentials
description: Test the /login POST endpoint to verify successful login with valid credentials and proper error response with invalid credentials.

title: get dashboard page rendering
description: Test the /dashboard GET endpoint to ensure the dashboard page is rendered correctly with all necessary components.

title: get system statistics json response
description: Test the /api/v1/stats GET endpoint to verify it returns correct and consistent system statistics in JSON format.

title: post create new print event
description: Test the /api/print_events POST endpoint to create a new print event with valid data and verify it is stored correctly.

title: get list print events with filters and pagination
description: Test the /api/v1/events GET endpoint to retrieve a list of print events filtered by date, user, printer, and support pagination with limit and offset.

title: get list users page rendering
description: Test the /usuarios GET endpoint to ensure the users list page is rendered correctly with user statistics.

title: post create or update user
description: Test the /admin/usuarios POST endpoint to create a new user or update an existing user with valid data.

title: get export users report excel
description: Test the /usuarios/export GET endpoint to verify the export of users report in Excel format.

title: post update printer sector
description: Test the /impressoras/update_sector POST endpoint to update the sector of a printer with valid printer name and sector data.

title: get list quotas
description: Test the /api/quotas GET endpoint to retrieve the list of quotas and verify the data correctness.
